Package org.iquantum.examples.cloudsim.container

Class ContainerCloudSimExample1

java.lang.Object
org.iquantum.examples.cloudsim.container.ContainerCloudSimExample1
public class ContainerCloudSimExample1 extends Object
A simple example showing how to create a data center with one host, one VM, one container and run one cloudlet on it.
